conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway rendering with clear wall thickness and floor plane separation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong geometric transformation with clear volume and consistent isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is largely faithful. Scale of the stairs has been exaggerated and the 'UP' orientation doesn't perfectly match the landings on the plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture and fixtures (toilet, kitchen, dining) are correctly placed; Bedroom 1 includes living-room-style labeling errors.

visual_clarity.notes: High structural clarity, but text labels ('Dining', 'Wash Area', 'Living Room 1') are baked into the 3D geometry which deducts presentation points.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan are rendered directly onto surfaces in the 3D model.
Bedroom 1 is incorrectly labeled as 'Living Room 1' in the 3D render.
Staircase geometry and landing direction do not perfectly align with the 2D plan's 'U' shape configuration.

summary: A high-quality 3D conversion that accurately maps the floor plan into a 3D volume, despite minor labeling errors and stair distortions.
